name: CivicAid (Django Learning Project)
tagline: Help-request workflow app with authentication, roles, and production deployment.
bullets: Built MVT-based Django app with accounts + hub apps and permission-controlled workflows.
Implemented authentication, role-based checks, messages framework, and Gmail SMTP email setup.
Deployed to Railway with production settings and Gunicorn.

name: Furliva (Final Year Project)
tagline: Online pet-products e-commerce with admin panel and Stripe checkout.
bullets: Built two React apps (customer frontend + admin) with routing and API integration.
Implemented product browsing, collections, cart-to-order flows, and admin management screens.
Integrated Stripe checkout and handled secure auth flows with JWT-based sessions.
